Stand Pup Comedy
About Us
If Laughter is the Best Medicine, Then We Are the Pharmacy!
Since 2015, Comic Cure has booked and produced countless comedy events across the country helping more than 200 non-profit organizations raise more than $2 million. We also teach comedy classes and have even broken the world record for most comedians on a single show! Our mission is to support live entertainers and local non-profit organizations by using the unifying power of laughter to uplift and engage communities.
Stand-Up Classes & Comedy Coaching
Have people always told you how funny you are? Looking to check stand-up comedian off your bucket list? Our individualized comedy classes will provide you with the foundation you need to be fool-proof funny!
Learn More
Book a Comedy Show at Your Venue
Interested in hosting a comedy show at your venue? We book and produce sold out shows for theaters, restaurants, wine bars and more!
Contact us today to learn more.
Contact Us
Private, Group & Fundraising Events
Whether it be a non-profit fundraiser, corporate outing, birthday celebration, bachelorette party...whatever your special occasion may be, our staff is ready to make it a wonderful experience for your group.
Contact Us
